unnormalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hitting Indian Roads!**
normalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hitting Indian Roads!**

unnormalised: Namaste, petrolheads! The Indian automotive scene is heating up faster than a Delhi summer! This week saw a flurry of vehicle launches, from compact SUVs perfect for navigating Bangalore traffic to luxury sedans that'll make you feel like royalty cruising down Marine Drive.
normalised: Namaste, petrolheads! The Indian automotive scene is heating up faster than a Delhi summer! This week saw a flurry of vehicle launches, from compact S U Vs perfect for navigating Bangalore traffic to luxury sedans that'll make you feel like royalty cruising down Marine Drive.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma unveiled the much-awaited "Vijay" SUV by Mahindra at a glitzy event in Mumbai, promising a fuel efficiency of 25 km/l. Tata also launched a swanky new EV, the "Bijlee," boasting a range of 400 km on a single charge. Rumour has it, it comes with a heads-up display showing cricket scores – now that’s innovation!
normalised: Doctor Sharma unveiled the much-awaited "Vijay" S U V by Mahindra at a glitzy event in Mumbai, promising a fuel efficiency of twenty five kilometer per liter. Tata also launched a swanky new E V, the "Bijlee," boasting a range of four hundred kilometer on a single charge. Rumour has it, it comes with a heads-up display showing cricket scores – now that’s innovation!

unnormalised: But wait, there's more! A European manufacturer rolled out their flagship sedan, starting at a cool Rs. 75 Lakhs. Talk about a Diwali bonus upgrade!
normalised: But wait, there's more! A European manufacturer rolled out their flagship sedan, starting at a cool rupee seventy five lakhs. Talk about a Diwali bonus upgrade!

unnormalised: These launches come as manufacturers compete for the growing Indian market, especially with increased demand in tier-2 cities. Experts predict this will lead to increased competition and hopefully, better features and prices for us consumers. Stay tuned for detailed reviews and test drives! And if you are still riding that trusty old scooter, there’s always Ola (just kidding!). A new showroom opening up in Lucknow covers a whopping 5000 sq ft.
normalised: These launches come as manufacturers compete for the growing Indian market, especially with increased demand in tier two cities. Experts predict this will lead to increased competition and hopefully, better features and prices for us consumers. Stay tuned for detailed reviews and test drives! And if you are still riding that trusty old scooter, there’s always Ola (just kidding!). A new showroom opening up in Lucknow covers a whopping five thousand square feet.
